column5: Hi guys bought a new diver I am going to check out this weekend called a Musky Torpedo. Looks real promising to hit the depths. Anyone tried them yet or the shark, or cuda??? Do you think a 30 ft. leader is enough instead of 100'. Would love to hear of any fish caught using this rig. Ry
Have never used one...I'm a Pink Lady man, myself LOL...but am interested to hear how it works out....be sure to post the results!
